Te Kūiti ‘ram raid’: Liquorland invaded by 14 sheep during Great New Zealand Muster https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/te-kuiti-ram-raid-liquorland-invaded-by-14-sheep-during-great-new-zealand-muster/UC7WZIKACFCNTDOG66JK4BNIRM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/te-kuiti-ram-raid-liquorland-invaded-by-14-sheep-during-great-new-zealand-muster/UC7WZIKACFCNTDOG66JK4BNIRM/ Maryana Garcia'It's so Kiwi,' said one onlooker, who thought the sheep were after a beer. Mon, 08 Apr 2024 02:02:29 +0000 Liquorland Te Kuiti's staff room was invaded by about 14 sheep during the town's annual Running of the Sheep event. Photo / Supplied

Emergency fundraising drive saves StarJam from closure https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/emergency-fundraise-drive-saves-starjam-from-closure/UB5PXUHWEVGMZB2IOHKF5TDSBY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/emergency-fundraise-drive-saves-starjam-from-closure/UB5PXUHWEVGMZB2IOHKF5TDSBY/ In less than a week, the not-for-profit raised more than $165,000.
